abstract: Jean-Jacques Gosso Gosso (born 15 March 1983 in Abidjan) is an Ivorian footballer who plays as a midfielder and he is currently playing for Turkish side Gençlerbirliği.Gosso, a defensive midfielder, has played in Côte d'Ivoire, Israel, Morocco, France and Turkey.
